subtitleNullable: Cleaned version of the dataset News Summary
descriptionNullable:
### Content
This dataset is an extension of the dataset News Summary by Kondalarao Vonteru.

Contains about 98,000 news and their summary, cleaned and preprocessed. The cleaning actions applied are:
- Remove URLs, htmls tags, emojis
- Expand common contractions
- Expand some Slang abbrevation
- Remove punctuation (except . ) non-characters, break line, hashtags
- Remove mentions @
- Remove stop words

### Acknowledgements

Thanks to Kondalarao Vonteru for providing us with the original dataset.

description:
### Content
This dataset is an extension of the dataset News Summary by Kondalarao Vonteru.

Contains about 98,000 news and their summary, cleaned and preprocessed. The cleaning actions applied are:
- Remove URLs, htmls tags, emojis
- Expand common contractions
- Expand some Slang abbrevation
- Remove punctuation (except . ) non-characters, break line, hashtags
- Remove mentions @
- Remove stop words

### Acknowledgements

Thanks to Kondalarao Vonteru for providing us with the original dataset.
